News.headline: Loan Update: 27th February 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Hyde, Heard, Shepherd, Barnwell and White
News.description:
Jimmy Shepherd came on for Whitehawk FC in the 64th minute as the Vanarama National League South side climbed out of the relegation zone with a 2-0 away win over Margate.

Tyrique Hyde who is also on loan at Whitehawk FC was an unused substitute as two former Daggers in Josh Passley and Glen Southam got the goals for the Hawks.

Midfielder Scott Heard played the full 90 minutes for East Thurrock United in their 2-1 home defeat to Poole Town in the Vanarama National League South, which leaves them in 11th place in the table.

Forward Joe White played 88 minutes for Wealdstone FC on Saturday winning 1-0 away at Welling United to stay in 13th place in the Vanarama National League South table.

Striker Shomari Barnwell played the full 90 minutes for Bishopâ€™s Stortford in their 4-1 home defeat to Eastbourne in the Vanarama Nationap League South, with the side currently six points away from safety in the table.
